glsa.title: libpng: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow has been found in the libpng library that could lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: libpng is an open, extensible image format library, with lossless compression.

description.p: In pngrutil.c, the function png_decompress_chunk() allocates insufficient space for an error message, potentially overwriting stack data, leading to a buffer overflow.

impact.p: By enticing a user to load a maliciously crafted PNG image, an attacker could execute arbitrary code with the rights of the user, or crash the application using the libpng library, such as the emul-linux-x86-baselibs.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
